message.content:
cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the optimization of learning algorithms for neuromorphic hardware, which falls under the category of neural networks and machine learning (cs.NE). The use of optimization tools such as cross-entropy methods and evolutionary strategies also suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The application of these techniques to enable agents to learn efficiently from rewards suggests a focus on robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY).
